definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3ms ´[[שׁ]]: Je 41:14; sf.[[וְשָׁבָם]] (consec) Je 43:12 (but rd. [[וְשָׁבָה]] Gie; Du conj.[[וְשֽׁמְמוּ]]); 2ms [[שָׁבִיתָ]] 2Ki 6:22, Ps 68:19, etc., Impf. 3ms. [[וַיִּשְׁבְּ]] Nu 21:1, Je 41:10, etc.; Imv.ms [[וּשְׁבֵה]] Ju Jdg 5:12; Inf. cstr. [[שְׁבוֹת]] Ob:Ob 11; Pt. act. Pl. [[שׁׂבִים]] Is 14:2, etc.; pass. mpl. [[שְׁבוּיִם]] Is 61:1, fpl. cstr. [[שְׁבֻיוֹת]] Ge 31:26;—take captive

definitions.title: 1.a.
definitions.body: c. acc. pers., Nu 24:22 (JE), 1Sa 30:2, 2Ki 5:2, 2Ki 6:22 (+ [[ב]] instr.) Je 41:10, Je 41:10 (but v:Je 41:10 b Gie reads [[וַיַּשְׁכֵּם]], cf. LXX Luc), v:Je 41:14, Ge 34:29 (P), 2Ch 28:8 (+ [[מִן]] part), + 6 t.; + Je 43:12 appar. c. acc. idols (but v. supra; acc. land Gie).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: pt. in periphrast. conjug. ([[לְשׁׂבֵיהֶם]]) [[וְהָיוּ שׁׂבִים]] Is 14:2; pt. c. sf. =  their captives, etc., 1Ki 8:46 = 2Ch 6:36, Is 14:2, Je 50:33, +5 t.; Pt. pass. Is 61:1 = captives; [[כִּשְׁבֻיוֹת חָָרֶב]] Ge 31:26 my daughters  as captives of the sword.

c. acc. cogn. [[שְׁבִי]] Ju Jdg 5:12 lead captive thy captives, cf. Ps 68:19, 2Ch 28:17, so (+ [[מִן]] pers.) Nu 21:1 (JE), and (acc. [[שִׁבְיׇה]]) 2Ch 28:5, 2Ch 28:11; [[שִׁבְיוֹ]] ´[[שׁ]]: De 21:10 = take him captive. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be taken captive: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִשְׁבָּה]], of man Ge 14:14, of beast Ex 22:9 (E), of ´[[עֵדֶר י]]: Je 13:17; 3 pl. [[נִשְׁבּוּ]], human subj. 1Sa 30:8, 1Sa 30:5, 1Ki 8:47 = 2Ch 6:37, Ez Eze 6:9.
